001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Iterator;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.Set;
008import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
009
010public record ProjectSpaces(List<ProjectSpace> values) implements Iterable<ProjectSpace> {
011
012  @FunctionalInterface
013  public interface Operator extends UnaryOperator<ProjectSpaces> {}
014
015  public Optional<ProjectSpace> find(String name) {
016    return values.stream().filter(space -> space.name().equals(name)).findFirst();
017  }
018
019  @Override
020  public Iterator<ProjectSpace> iterator() {
021    return values.iterator();
022  }
023
024  public ProjectSpaces with(ProjectSpace value) {
025    var values = new ArrayList<>(values());
026    values.add(value);
027    return new ProjectSpaces(List.copyOf(values));
028  }
029
030  public ProjectSpaces withSpace(String name, ProjectSpace.Operator operator) {
031    return with(operator.apply(new ProjectSpace(name, List.of(), DeclaredModules.of())));
032  }
033
034  public ProjectSpaces withSpace(
035      String name, Set<String> parentSpaceNames, ProjectSpace.Operator operator) {
036    var parents = values.stream().filter(space -> parentSpaceNames.contains(space.name())).toList();
037    var space = new ProjectSpace(name, parents, DeclaredModules.of());
038    return with(operator.apply(space));
039  }
040
041  public ProjectSpaces tweakModule(DeclaredModule.Tweak tweak) {
042    return new ProjectSpaces(values.stream().map(space -> space.tweak(tweak)).toList());
043  }
044}
